name: 1Boss1Battle1Button
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Welcome to the depths of binary hell. In this place you only get two colors, and one of everything else. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This game was created by Bryce Bucher and Ayden Machajewski for the GMTK 2019 48 hour jam with the theme "Only One". In it, you will find yourself enduring against 3 phases of a rhythmic bossfight, each set to a blood pumpin' beat. Your only means of defense is a single button. Holding it will allow you crouch and remain stationary, and letting go will give you a brief, nostalgic wind as you ascend.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Features:

- One Button 

-Controller Support (for the above mentioned button)

-Accessibility Options

-Filthy Factory Pomo Aesthetic

-Very Fresh Beats

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Credits:

Bryce Bucher: Design, Programming, Animation, Asset Creation, Graphic Design

Ayden Machajewski: Design, Programming, FMOD Integration, Music, Sound Design, Moral Support

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

(Check us out on Twitter: @BryceBucher, @ajmachajewski)
